name: Bleeps & Bounds
description:
Bleeps & Bounds!Compose Yourself!  Platformer + Music Maker. FAQ "I get an error message an error message, how can I play?"

If you get an error message like this:

abort(114). Build with -s ASSERTIONS=1 for more info.

Try enabling "third party cookies" and reloading the page.

It seems this error results from some issue between Itch.io and games exported from Godot.
